message: Starting review of Simple Test phase - gathering phase handover and agent findings
Examining completed e2e-test agent output to verify deliverables
Review complete - e2e-test agent successfully completed its minimal task of reporting completion. Preparing verdict.

Review completed - discovered CRITICAL blocker: SQLite agents table missing 'final_verdict' column. Cannot submit verdict due to schema error. Phase deliverables were met (agent successfully reported completion), but review system is broken. Reported as critical finding.
